Frequently Asked Questions

1 Despite subscribing, I am unable to access the content, and it prompts me to subscribe again

Your subscription and login email addresses must be the same. If you are still experiencing issues, please share your registered email ID, contact number, and transaction details with contact@noticebard.com.

2 What are the benefits of being a subscriber/paid user of NoticeBard?

As a subscriber to NoticeBard, you gain access to a variety of exclusive content and opportunities, including:

  • Unlimited updates on internships and job opportunities
  • Comprehensive full-stack interview question banks*
  • Specialized test series*
  • A wide selection of e-books*
  • Personalized notifications tailored to your interests

*Please note that these services are customizable based on our subscription plans.

3 What is the process for upgrading or renewing my subscription?

Upon the expiration of your subscription, a renewal popup will appear to guide you through the renewal process. If you wish to upgrade your subscription plan, you can do so directly from the landing page at any time.

4 What is the process for resetting my password if I forget it?

If you forget your password, click on the “Forgot Password” link on the login page. Follow the instructions provided to reset your password.

5 Will I receive personalized notifications via WhatsApp or email?

Yes, as a subscribed user, you will receive daily notifications on WhatsApp and Telegram. Additionally, we will send weekly personalized updates to your email.

6 Will my credit card and other payment details be safe?

Yes, your credit card and payment details are secure. We use Razorpay’s secure payment gateway, which adheres to all applicable terms and conditions, privacy policies, and liability standards as detailed here.

7 Can I make changes to an order that has already been placed?

Unfortunately, once an order has been placed, it cannot be changed.

8 To whom should I contact If an order is placed but the features and facilities are inactive?

For any queries, please write to us at gurjit@noticebard.com Call us at 9866673434

9 What is the refund policy?

For CSE subscriptions, no refund will be issued once the payment has been made.

10 Apart from opportunity updates, do I get additional services as a subscriber?

Yes, we also offer-

  • Full-stack development [Frontend; Framework; Backend, Interview Question Bank]
  • Campus placement test series,
  • E-books and,
  • Weekly personalized Updates.

For submitting a Post

  • gurjit@noticebard.com
  • contact@noticebard.com

For banner ads & admission campaigns

  • +91 90235 43927
  • rohit@noticebard.com
  • Hours: 11 AM - 7 PM (Mon-Fri)
